title: The Tinder Swindler
description:
True Crime is back on the podcast, as Tig and Cheryl decipher Netflix's "The Tinder Swindler," about a cosmopolitan con-man who steals jaw-dropping sums from his dates. Plus, geography-related nonsense, and Tig tells a memorable tale about tipping! *this episode spills beans* Get merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
